name: Cave Explorer (itch) (patwork)
description:
Simple (literally) "on-rails" cave shooter.

You drive in a mining cart through the endless corridors of the mine. Watch out for obstacles!

WARNING: this game uses GLES3, which may not be supported by all internet browsers. The Firefox web browser is recommended.




Created for Godot Wild Jam #45 "UNDERGROUND"

Assets used:

  • cave textures: https://3dtextures.me/
  • sound effects:  https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/
  • font: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Sigmar+One

Godot 3.4.4 / Blender / Gimp / Krita / Audacity
